statements.statement: CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_primary on `travel-sample` USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_name_type on `travel-sample`(name) WHERE _type='User' USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_faa ON `travel-sample`(faa) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_icao ON `travel-sample`(icao) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_city ON `travel-sample`(city) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_airportname ON `travel-sample`(airportname) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_type ON `travel-sample`(type) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_sourceairport ON `travel-sample`(sourceairport) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_schedule_utc on `travel-sample`(ARRAY s.utc FOR s IN schedule END) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_route_src_dst_day ON `travel-sample` (sourceairport, destinationairport, DISTINCT ARRAY v.day FOR v IN schedule END) WHERE type='route' USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
